prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that resembles a celestial body with a serene demeanor.
I want a mystical moon-inspired Pokemon with a calming presence and elegant shape.
Generate an image of a psychic creature with a pale color palette and unique features.
Make a Pokemon that embodies tranquility, featuring crescent shapes and soothing colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that floats gracefully in the night sky, radiating peaceful energy.
Design a celestial-themed Pokemon with a round body and distinctive markings.
Show me a unique Pokemon that combines lunar aesthetics with psychic abilities.
